text: Roger Wallis (8 August 1941 – 22 January 2022) was a British-born Swedish musician, journalist and researcher.The Swedish Film Database: Roger Wallis He was an adjunct professor of multimedia at the Royal Institute of Technology in Stockholm.KTH Computer Science and Communication: Professorer , accessed 21 May 2010 Between 1967 and 1981, Wallis was the main presenter of the English language The Saturday Show on Radio Sweden. Wallis also co-wrote "Judy, min vän". Wallis died on 22 January 2022, at the age of 80.Roger Wallis är död ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Swedish musicians Category:Swedish journalists Category:Swedish television personalities Category:Writers from Warwickshire Category:Swedish academics
title: Roger Wallis
